basics.name: Rodolfo Rafael Dzul Cetina
basics.label: Full Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience
basics.summary: Self-taught Full Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience in building responsive websites, covering the entire development lifecycle—from design and research to production deployment, performance optimization, and continuous improvement. Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a strong focus on clean design and best practices. Passionate about learning and experimenting with modern technologies like ReactJs and VueJs to develop innovative solutions. Experienced in AWS services, integrating various solutions within the ecosystem. Proven leadership experience managing teams of 10+ members, with a strong ability to mentor and enhance the technical skills of team members.

work.name: Clubhub
work.summary: Develop an Plataform for managing vacation club memberships, including a booking engine and a self-management platform for members. The platform is built with a modern tech stack, including SvelteKit, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. It integrates with AWS services such as Lambda, S3, DynamoDB, and GraphQL to provide a scalable and efficient solution. As a full stack developer, I am responsible for the entire development lifecycle, from design and research to production deployment and performance optimization.

work.name: The Palace Company
work.summary: Led a product team in the development and implementation of a Unified Reservation Platform, utilizing a modern tech stack, including Serverless framework and Micro Frontends with Vue 3, Vue 2, and React. Played a key role in implementing Micro Frontends architecture and integrating AWS services such as SNS, SQS, DynamoDB, Lambda, EventBridge, RDS, and S3. Managed CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and infrastructure as code with Terraform. As a technical lead, I was responsible for conducting technical interviews, hiring developers, and designing technical challenges to assess candidates’ skills using platforms such as DevSkiller and TestGorilla. Focused on building a high-performing team by mentoring members and fostering a culture of continuous improvement.

work.name: The Palace Company
work.summary: Provided technical leadership to a product development team, overseeing the maintenance and migration of a monolithic architecture to a more flexible and optimized solution. Advocated for best practices, performance improvements, and a culture of rapid value delivery to users. Key projects as a technical lead include: palaceelite.com: A self-management platform for vacation club memberships and room reservations with exclusive benefits. bookingsthegrandpr.moonpalace.com: A booking engine designed for the general public

work.name: General Datacomm de México
work.summary: At General DataComm, I contributed to the development of an ERP system for the State Government, focusing on the Materials Resource Management module. This module was responsible for overseeing the supply chain of healthcare materials. I played a key role in developing the module using Laravel for the backend and Vue for the frontend. Additionally, I collaborated with the technical team to transition the development stack to a more modern and scalable architecture, enhancing system performance and maintainability.

work.name: Administración Portuaria Integral de Quintana Roo
work.summary: At Administración Portuaria Integral de Quintana Roo, I contributed to the development of multiple systems to streamline port operations. Key projects included: SOP (Port Operations System): A platform designed to manage the transportation, arrival, and tax collection of cargo containers entering the state through the regulated port facilities in Cozumel and Isla Mujeres. Warehouse Management Application: Developed a system to manage the entry and exit of items in the warehouse, improving operational efficiency. Inventory Control Platform: Created a platform for the inventory control of port facilities, optimizing tracking and management of goods. Internal Processes Platform: Designed and implemented a platform to manage and streamline the company’s internal processes, enhancing workflow efficiency. These platforms contributed significantly to improving port operations and internal management, ensuring smoother operations and compliance with regulations.

education.institution: Tecnológico Nacional de México, Campus Chetumal
